column5: Hi everyone, I fished a small lake north of the kawarthas this past weeken d and managed my PB smallie. The fight was incredible. I have no idea how much it weigh as i didn't have a scale but it was for sure bigger than my previous PB. We also had a pike pushing 40" take one of our bass as we reeled it in. I started targeting bass last year, and i'm hooked. Here's a couple of smaller fish followed by the bigger one  Cheers and thanks for reading...
Beauty fish, congrats on your PB!
all HAWGS, nice fish you caught there.
Nice fish! Hope you enjoyed the thunder and lightning show. We are doing it ever weekend to impress the cottagers...HAHAHA.
beauty smallies, must of been exciting!
Some absolutely gorgeous smallies man - congrats on your PB.
Thanks everyone for your replies, she was caught with the Big O, working a really fast retrieve in clear water
Nice smallie. She must have fought like a mini tank! Thanks for sharing.
Absolute gorgeous bronze..... congrats JCRG on your PB Leechman
